sentences.english: She was Dan's favorite model, cherished confidante and dearest friend.
sentences.chinese: 她是丹最愛的偶像，珍視的紅顏知己和摯友。

sentences.english: Fellow entertainers including Chow Yun-Fat, the couple's long-time friend, have sent condolences.
sentences.chinese: 娛樂圈內演藝人員包括摯友周潤發前至哀悼慰問。

sentences.english: You're a wonderful friend, and I treasure you more with every day.
sentences.chinese: 你是一位難得的摯友，我對你的珍重與日俱增。

sentences.english: So he has made some underpants to his friends. The effect is also extremely good.
sentences.chinese: 於是就做了幾條金冷褲送給摯友，效果同樣了不得。

sentences.english: I’ll take all the New BFFs I can get.
sentences.chinese: 我會接受所有我能得到的“終身摯友”。

sentences.english: He was an intimate friend of Huang Zongxi (1610-1695), the famous thinker in east Zhejiang, and was deeply influenced by the latter.
sentences.chinese: 他是浙東著名思想家黃宗羲的摯友，深受其思想影響。

sentences.english: He was right, but I still felt as if I'd lost a friend.
sentences.chinese: 他所言極是，但我始終覺得我失去了一位摯友。

sentences.english: The man who is to be happy will therefore need virtuous friends.
sentences.chinese: 因此，嚮往幸福的人需要品格高尚的摯友。

sentences.english: Rice cakes and giving each other the gift, to enhance the friends and relatives of love.
sentences.chinese: 年糕又是互相奉送的禮品，來增長親友摯友之情。

sentences.english: You and your faithful friend Dupin set out for Hungary to get to the bottom of things.
sentences.chinese: 你和你的摯友杜平出發去匈牙利去追查事情的真相。

sentences.english: So, my good friends, let me say congratulations to all of you.
sentences.chinese: 因此，我的摯友們，讓我向你們所有人祝賀。

sentences.english: Your friend in adversity may be among the best of your friends. He is the most patient and cheerful spiritual companion.
sentences.chinese: 患難之交可以成爲摯友，他最有耐心而令人愉悅。

sentences.english: Thank you for being a faithful correspondent and a good friend.
sentences.chinese: 謝謝你，我忠實的信友和摯友。

sentences.english: Chen Heqin and Tao Xingzhi, the co-founders of Nanjing Xiaozhuang Normal School, were lifetime comrades and close friends.
sentences.chinese: 教育家陳鶴琴先生與陶行知是一生的同志與摯友。

sentences.english: Friendships come and go but friends in deed remain forever.
sentences.chinese: 友誼來去匆匆，摯友與世長存。

sentences.english: Mrs. Gaskell has become her close friends, both close in the past.
sentences.chinese: 蓋斯凱爾夫人成了她的摯友，兩人過往甚密。

definition: to get to know each other/acquaintance
elder brother/term of respect for a man of about the same age
to agree (on a meeting place, date etc)/to reach agreement/to make an appointment
to get to know sb/to meet sb for the first time
to carry/to take along/to bring along/to hold (hands)/also pr. [xi1]
the younger generation/those who come after
